title: Smoothly ~ reducing and eliminating the required, high level of prediction in the markets.
text: we don't have the means to take initiative for imagining a future, non-yet announced, nor ticketed concerts, exhibitions or festivals, while observing the collective demand as in meaningful statistics in an anonymity. We are mostly expected to browse or purchase only existing events, based on market-place-like approach and hence, deterministic and further communication blocking ticketing mechanisms and risky, or non-meaningful insights strategies.
